parameters: \n<\c[11]Barman>Would you like a draft beer, sir?
\n<\c[11]Barman>Here it is! It's cold as a snowflake!
The party members have been fully recovered.
\n<\c[11]Barman>Come back when you need a drink!
\n<\c[12]Alex>I am the most famous hero of the golden age!
\n<\c[12]Alex>Characters from the RM2K era have busts with several
different expressions to use in conversations.
\n<\c[12]Alex>What? Have you never heard of me?
Would you like to change your party to 2K Heroes?
\n<\c[12]Ninin>Nothing better than having a beer with old friends!
Would you like to change your party to 2K Heroes?
\n<\c[12]Daisy>I really miss the time when I starred in several games.
Unfortunately, time passes for everyone and now I am retired.
\n<\c[12]Daisy>I also have several busts with different expressions.
So maybe I'll be back in a game again, who knows.
Would you like to change your party to 2K Heroes?
Thank God I got a job, I was unemployed for a long time!
Would you like to change your party to Cover Art Heroes?
\n<\c[12]Dilara>I'm the Magician of the cover characters party.
Sometimes, we need a quality beer with friends to relax a little!
Would you like to change your party to Cover Art Heroes?
I am the elder of the party.
Would you like to change your party to Cover Art Heroes?
\n<\c[12]Yaichi>I'm a samurai and came from Japan.
I wanted to have some sake, but there is only beer, so I had to conform.
Would you like to change your party to Cover Art Heroes?
\n<\c[12]Harold>I'm the protagonist from RPG Maker MV.
I'm here to represent the MV party!
Would you like to change your party to MV Heroes?
\n<\c[12]Ilia>I'm part of the RPG Maker MV cast.
\n<\c[12]Ilia>Unfortunately, not all of us have busts.
In that case, you can use the face to illustrate the characters.
\n<\c[12]Ilia>Several characters have facesets with different expressions
to be used during the dialogues.
Would you like to change your party to MV Heroes?
\n<\c[12]Yang>I'm the capitain of the King's Army.
I solved to help the MV party to defeat the Dark Knight.
Would you like to change your party to MV Heroes?
\n<\c[12]Dark Mage>I'm the Dark Mage from RPG Maker MV.
My name is a secret and I don't will tell this to you!
I solved to help the MV party because i need to defeat the Dark Knight.
Would you like to change your party to MV Heroes?
\n<\c[12]Lucas>I'm the Fighter from Vibrato Heroes party.
Most of us have a bust edited by CoopNinjask, based on the original
A face was also edited by CoopNinjask from the busts.
Would you like to change your party to Vibrato Heroes?
\n<\c[12]Yasmin>I'm the Healer from Vibrato Heroes party.
You can use these busts in conversations or create a bust menu, for example.
Would you like to change your party to Vibrato Heroes?
\n<\c[12]Lara>I'm the Magician from Vibrato Heroes party.
Vibrato Heroes equipment icons \I[2688] have also been edited and included
Would you like to change your party to Vibrato Heroes?
\n<\c[12]Asuka>I'm the Ninja from Vibrato Heroes party.
As you can see, some of us have additional colors that can be used
Would you like to change your party to Vibrato Heroes?
After a brief absence, we went back to star in games again!
Would you like to change your party to XP Heroes?
Arshes called me for a new adventure and I came to accompany him.
Would you like to change your party to XP Heroes?
All of us from the XP era have busts to accompany the package and
some of us have alternative busts to offer an extra alternative when
Would you like to change your party to XP Heroes?
As you can see, some of us from the XP era have alternative colors
Would you like to change your party to XP Heroes?
No, I'm not from RM2K era, I'm a newcomer.
\n<\c[12]Ziegfred>I tried to invite my friends to come with me, but
there was only one vacancy, so I came alone.
\n<\c[12]Ziegfred>There are other original characters included in the package.
We were created by other artists a long time ago and edited by CoopNinjask
That way, we can participate in new adventures.
\n<\c[12]Ziegfred>For now, I'm here talking to the legends.
They are telling me their incridible stories from the past!
Would you like to change your party to 2K Heroes?
